title: Ticket #1443: Create ticket target version updater
description:
When a release is made, any still open tickets targetted for that release need to be pushed out to the next release. This is frequently a large number of tickets. An automated tool is desired.

Said tool should use the web interface, to ensure that the history is properly updated.

I am working on such a tool, and I believe it is alpha ready, but I'm hesitant to make its first run against the live site, since there is potential for making a big mess.
